medical_history.chief_complaint: Constipation for 10 days and intermittent abdominal pain in the left lower quadrant.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient reports no normal bowel movement for 10 days, typically has watery stools. She attempted treatment with Colace and PR Dulcolax, which allowed her to pass mucus and liquid, but no substantial stool. Intermittent left lower quadrant abdominal pain resolves with the defecation of mucus. Experienced subjective fevers and chills 3 days ago. No nausea or vomiting noted.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Benign cervical polyps, iliotibial band syndrome, stress fractures, borderline hypertension.
